sentences.en: Puyi , who is just like an outcast, read out the abdicate rescript.
sentences.cn: 如同丧家之犬的溥仪也随之神情沮丧地宣读了退位主诏书.

sentences.en: Rescript, after been write, save, come out to hint again mistake, say to be lost again.
sentences.cn: 重写, 写好后保存, 又出来提示错误, 称再次丢失.

sentences.en: This rule is set forth in the rescript of the Emperor Antoninus.
sentences.cn: 这项规定是在安东尼皇帝颁布的法令中提出的。

trans.tran_cn: 重写，法令，重写（改写）本，<罗马，史>皇帝的书面答复
